content:
Resorts Services and Amenities

 

We have combined our most widely used services and amenities in a Resort Fee to provide our guests with the very best experience during their stay at Split Rock.

As a result of this program, you'll receive only the best from Split Rock resort:

  • Outdoor ice skating
  • Laser Tag
  • In-suite WiFi (except in Westwood Villas)
  • Live entertainment
  • Daily activities led by our Recreation Team including craft time
  • Equipment and maintenance of resort activities including sledding, volleyball, bicycles, outdoor ice-skating, miniature golf, billiards, racquetball, indoor/outdoor tennis, basketball and more – click here for a full list of resort activities
  • Resort shuttle
  • Concierge service at our Front Desk
  • Local and toll free calls
  • Indoor and outdoor pools

The resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room is a daily charge. This charge will be automatically billed to your guestroom account and is subject to change. Valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.
